text: Agar naf'i zudhosilsavanda va safari oson meʙud, az paji tu (munofiqon) meomadand, vale aknun, (on ci ʙa on da'vat mekuni ʙa ʙaromadan ʙa cangi Taʙuk), ki masofati roh ʙa onho dur namud va havo garm ast, pajmudanasro dusvor mehisoʙand. Va ʙa Alloh qasam mexurand, ki agar metavonistem, hamrohi sumo ʙerun meomadem. Inho tan ʙa halokat mesuporand (ʙo on savgandi duruƣason). Alloh medonad, ki munofiqon duruƣ megujand
